referenceType.description: linked dataset is used in the current publication (only to link publication and dataset)
linked publication uses the current dataset (only to link dataset and publication)
linked dataset is a newer version of the current dataset
linked dataset is an older version of the current dataset
indicates that the current dataset is continued by the linked dataset (e.g., for time series)
indicates that the current dataset continues by the linked dataset (e.g., for time series)
linked dataset is a source upon which the current dataset is based
the original dataset is the source of the linked dataset
linked dataset (e.g., synthesis datasets) is the result of a compile or creation event using the current dataset
linked dataset is used to compile or create the current dataset (e.g., synthesis datasets)
linked dataset is part of a collection (e.g., header data and species data)
unspecific link to a dataset or publication
